title: further research
body:
helo
there will be something on the box tonight
its another test
but right now we are entangled in cables
however
weather permitting
our technical experts will resolve the entanglement
itll be broadcast as a quicktime h.264 stream
if youve got a mac you'll already probably have quicktime player
if youve got a pc and it doesnt work, you might need to download the installer (click here to download and install)

then click on to
www2.radiohead.tv
